name: Farmsphere Inc.
overview:
Farmsphere.com is the place where social food traceability improves the food consumption experience

Concept

Farmsphere.com seeks to enhance the food consumption experience through the implementation of a system of social traceability that implies:

  • Food description records used in the interaction with the consumer and in brand online reputation management.
  • Link between products and the relevant network of agents of production and marketing chains.
  • Verification of credentials and relationships between the various agents of the agrifood chains.
